result.name: genetic change of Aspergillus terreus with adaptive laboratory evolution in lignocellulose-derived model inhibitors
result.description: Strain breeding is important for the efficient itaconic acid fermentability. Here, it presented genetic variation of Aspergillus terreus with adaptive laboratory evolution in lignocellulose-derived model inhibitors. The key mutation would provide a robust strain biocatalyst for the production of biochemicals.
